originalText.text: Im giving 4 stars because Dr. Igor and the nurse were GREAT!! I had bad experiences with different urologists in the past but Dr Igor really helped me understanding what was going on with my Utis, did all the analysis and did his best to make me feel better. However, I waited 2 hours before being consulted (but it was worth the waiting)

originalText.text: The waiting is insane, why take 40 o 50 patients in one day????? I know the money is everything for doctors but arrrrr I always wait 4  to 5 hours in this office.....  but the nurse  told me that if you have to pay copayments and have a private insurance you wont have to wait for so long, the Russian anesthesiologist injected me the anesthesia, antibiotic and the serum one behind the other so fast that he made me a big knot and they did not even ckeck my blood pressure before doing it, the nurse was very rude and unprofessional like the anesthesiologist, I don't recommend this place, they think they are dealing with pigsðŸ˜

originalText.text: Dr Igor one of the best urologist in NYC...so many years in the field he dominate the latest technology in prostate cancer treatment.  I'm a living example of that. I recommend Dr Ryndin..

originalText.text: Hola amigos pasientes, hoy mi 2da visita a Ã¨ste Dr. El serÃ  muy bueno en sus conocimientos en la medicina como Neurologo, pero muy inconsiente y pienso que solo le importa lo que produce, Dan appointment 4 personas por hora siempre uno llega a su cita que le ponen y le piden que llegue temprano, en mi dos cita le llegÃ³ mejor antes, onestamente lleguÃ¨ 15 minutes pasado y siempre hay que esperar de 2 a 3 horas ante de que Ã¨l te llame, hay como 8 a10 mujeres a su servicio cantidad de pa ientes para la misma hora, es un abusador, inconciente que no le importa tu tiempo, no lo recomiendo y no buelvo.

text.text: Hello patient friends, today my 2nd visit to this Dr. He will be very good in his knowledge of medicine as a Neurologist, but very unconscious and I think he only cares about what he produces, Dan appoints 4 people per hour, one always arrives at his appointment What they tell him and they ask him to arrive early, on my second appointment he arrived better earlier, honestly I arrived 15 minutes late and you always have to wait 2 to 3 hours before he calls you, there are like 8 to 10 women at his service quantity of patients for the same time, he is an abuser, unaware that he does not care about your time, I do not recommend it and I will not return.

originalText.text: la enfermera Luisa es  un amor, muy buena persona y muy trabajadora el doctor Igor tiene suerte de tenerla en su equipo.

text.text: Nurse Luisa is a sweetheart, a very good person and a very hard worker. Doctor Igor is lucky to have her on his team.
